txt.en: 'Aye, I thought I was dead for sure. My thanks, stranger!'
'At your service and your family's forever! Now how do I get out of here?'
'One of those cheeky spiders nipped my nose in there! I'll have them for that...after a bit of a rest I think!'
'I'm not eaten? Praise you and your forefathers!'
'Quickly! Let us make good our escape before they capture us again!'
Rescued cocooned dwarves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'May your beard never know the frost of winter! Quickly, let's get out of here!'
Defeated crystal brood-mother
A Ravenous Hatchling has emerged from the nest...
Private Instance: The Spider Nest

You have been asked to rescue the dwarf-expedition that has been captured within the old armoury before they are devoured by the foul spiders who have woven a great nest within. Should you succeed, you have the blessing of Durin's Folk to make use of the anvil there to empower the infused adamant you bear.
You have created an empowered adamant
A Ravenous Hatchling has devoured one of the Dwarves!
You must rescue the dwarves cocooned within the ancient armoury before they are devoured by the ravenous hatchlings from the nest.
Use the ancient forge to empower your infused adamant.
Rescue cocooned dwarves ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the crystal brood-mother
Use the ancient anvil
<rgb=#FF0000>Dwarves Devoured ([placeholder]/[placeholder])</rgb>
Instance: The Spider-nest
'A blessing on your father's beard for this timely rescue!'
'I could barely wiggle my toes in there! Thank you!'
